template.funcBody:
const message = `Dear ${ {{ getCustomer.data.contactname[0]}} }, 

I am so sorry that your order was ${ {{refundSelectInput.value}} }.

Please rest assured that your refund of ${ {{currency1.value}} } USD has been authorized. 

The money shall be with you in 1-5 business days.

We do very apologize for any inconveniences that caused. 

Have a wonderful rest of the day!`

return message
